channel.title: Interface at Start
channel.description:
I am wondering.... how do you make the interface pop up when you log in? I mean it's the first thing you see. How do you make that show? I would appreciate the help =] (Trying to put my custom startup intreface as the first thing you see.)
Basically like when you start in runescape, you see that thing that says your messages and days left for membership.... but how do you mkae it so it is a different one and pop up as the first thing you see. (I need the location and where to put it and what to put)
EDIT: Also my interface ID is 1500 (Custom)

item.title: Interface at Start
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

My custom start up interface when you login, id is 1500. i am using a 420, but i might upgrade to 474 for skillcape emotes.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface at Start
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

508’s are different, that’s why it’s been done on them. What he means is that he hasn’t seen it been done on any before that.

What interface do you want to pop up?

Read full topic

item.title: Interface at Start
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:310454”][quote author=Stupid Ninja link=topic=406883.msg3006632#msg3006632 date=1256452968]
In your client.java there should be a ‘Initialize’ or something void search for it and add this somewhere abouts the middle:

newvoidname();

Then add this somewhere up the top:

public void newvoidname() { sendQuest("blablabla", ###); showInterface(1500); }

The ‘sendQuest’ void sends text to the client for a specific ID of text (e.g. Quest Book or A Scroll)
Hope this helps
[/quote]

I believe he’s referring to the FIRST screen that shows up. The one that says your IP, messages, members days left, and message.

To my knowledge, no one has done this yet, but I’m trying to figure out how to do it right now.[/quote]

You are correct about this, but im not talking about interface 1 or 2… and I have seen it done on 508’s… =/ but thatnks for your guys help anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface at Start
item.dc:creator: @Stupid_Ninja Stupid Ninja
item.description:
@Stupid_Ninja wrote:

Just pop it in your ‘initialization’ void. (A custom void you have made to show the interface etc.)

Read full topic

[quote=“Stupid Ninja, post:2, topic:310454”]In your client.java there should be a ‘Initialize’ or something void search for it and add this somewhere abouts the middle:

newvoidname();

Then add this somewhere up the top:

public void newvoidname() { sendQuest("blablabla", ###); showInterface(1500); }

The ‘sendQuest’ void sends text to the client for a specific ID of text (e.g. Quest Book or A Scroll)
Hope this helps[/quote]

I believe he’s referring to the FIRST screen that shows up. The one that says your IP, messages, members days left, and message.

To my knowledge, no one has done this yet, but I’m trying to figure out how to do it right now.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Stupid_Ninja wrote:

In your client.java there should be a ‘Initialize’ or something void search for it and add this somewhere abouts the middle:

newvoidname();

Then add this somewhere up the top:

The ‘sendQuest’ void sends text to the client for a specific ID of text (e.g. Quest Book or A Scroll)
